snippet: WIGOD--Robert Maynard. Congregation Emanu-El of the City of New York expresses to the family of our devoted member Robert Wigod our deepest sympathies on the occasion of his passing. It is our hope and prayer that beautiful memories will linger as...
lead_paragraph: WIGOD--Robert Maynard. Congregation Emanu-El of the City of New York expresses to the family of our devoted member Robert Wigod our deepest sympathies on the occasion of his passing. It is our hope and prayer that beautiful memories will linger as a legacy to his life. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WIGOD, ROBERT MAYNARD
